name: Game of Life (itch) (Livia)
description:
This is my Lua implementation of Conway's Game of Life; it was made for learning purposes, so don't expect any surprises: just a simple menu and the game itself. I followed tutorials, consulted forums and used tools programmed by other people; these are all credited bellow.

All code is available at this repository.

You can navigate the menu using the up and down arrows, and select one of the items by pressing Enter. The rest you can find out at How To Play.

Credits

  • For the game, I mostly followed this tutorial.
  • For the menu, this thread was very helpful.
  • To port the game for web, I used this package by David Khachaturov.
